function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on digital technologies for epidemic monitoring and control","Impact":"Ineffective control of disease spread due to technology failures","Mitigation":"Diversification of monitoring methods, regular technological updates, and backup systems","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence, big data, Internet of things, cloud computing, blockchain, additive manufacturing, 5G","People":"Global population, health organizations, governments","Owner":"Technology developers, health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"High-speed network reliance for tracking strategic locations and infected patients","Impact":"Data inaccuracies, network failures, and privacy breaches","Mitigation":"Data validation, backup networks, privacy protection measures","Technologies":"High-speed networks, smartphone apps, application software","People":"Infected patients, general population","Owner":"Network service providers, app developers, health organizations"},{"Description":"Industry 4.0 and Medicine 4.0 adoption","Impact":"Technological disruptions, data security risks, and reliance on evolving systems","Mitigation":"Robust cybersecurity measures, regular system audits, and staff training","Technologies":"Industry 4.0, Medicine 4.0","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"}]}
